oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Advertisement from Nashville City Directory, 1871
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A page of advertisement from the 1871 Nashville City Directory featuring Wm. Stewart & Son, “manufacturers of every description of iron work, bank doors, jail work, prison cells, vaults and vault doors, wrought and cast iron railings, of every pattern, gratings, etc.,” located at Corner Market and Ash Streets in downtown Nashville. Also an advertisement for Dr. J. C. Ross, Dentist, no. 44 Union Street and Mechanics Bank, no. 30 College Street “receives deposits and deals in foreign and domestic exchange.” Forms part of Nashville City Directory Collection, Metro Archives. 1 digital image.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: William Stewart & Son (Nashville, Tenn.); Ross, J.C.; Mechanics Bank (Nashville, Tenn.)
